name: PDFDisplayMode
desc: A wrapper for the chosen display mode constant.

items.name: case singlePage
items.desc: A display mode where the document displays one page at a time horizontally and vertically.

items.name: case singlePageContinuous
items.desc: A display mode where the document displays in continuous mode vertically, with single-page width horizontally.

items.name: case twoUp
items.desc: A display mode where the document displays two pages side-by-side.

items.name: case twoUpContinuous
items.desc: A display mode where the document displays in continuous mode vertically and displays two pages side-by-side horizontally.
